Class NumeralFunctions

java.lang.Object
  NumeralFunctions

public class NumeralFunctions
extends java.lang.Object

This class is a collection of methods that allow the manipulation and conversion of strings and numbers whether they be integers, doubles or longs. This class is used to convert numbers to strings and vise versa. This class also contains methods to check if a string only contains numbers, only contains numbers and spaces and currency digits such a the pound symbol and also if a string doesn't contain any invalid characters. It's quite a well used class by the AccountsGUIListener class and the ATMServerProtocol class

Author:
Jamie Brindle (06352322)
